p: We constructed all possible reduced models from the global models. The model with the lowest AICc was typically used as the best-fit model for inference, except in cases where an equally parsimonious model (i.e. ΔAICc ≤ 2.0) had fewer parameters. Exhaustive model assessment was conducted in R using the lme4 package [ 43] in conjunction with the pdredge function in package MuMIn [ 45], which allowed us to parallelize model selection using the snow package [ 46] and L. Aslett's pre-made Amazon EC2 R image [ 47].
